author: Reuters Editorial
title: Factbox: Coronavirus deaths pass 5,400 worldwide
description: Some 145,594 people have been infected by the coronavirus across the world and 5,419 have died, according to a Reuters tally.
content:
(Reuters) - Some 145,594 people have been infected by the coronavirus across the world and 5,419 have died, according to a Reuters tally. 
In China there have been 80,945 cases and 3,180 cases.

title: Greece bans all links with Albania, North Macedonia, flights with Spain
description: Greece said on Sunday it would ban road and sea routes, as well as flights, to Albania and North Macedonia, and ban flights to and from Spain to stem the spread of the coronavirus.
content:
ATHENS (Reuters) - Greece said on Sunday it would ban road and sea routes, as well as flights, to Albania and North Macedonia, and ban flights to and from Spain to stem the spread of the coronavirus.

title: Countries offer solidarity to their neighbours amid Covid-19 outbreak
description: Whilst Albania and Germany offer aid to their struggling neighbours, solidarity grows within borders as well.
content:

Albania has sent a group of 30 doctors and nurses to neighbouring Italy to assist in the country's battle against the new coronavirus.
